title: Pahalgam terror attack: Pakistan political, military brass ordered hit; ISI gave 'directions' to LeT
content: Sources indicate the Pahalgam terror attack, which resulted in 26 civilian deaths, was orchestrated by Pakistan's ISI and Lashkar-e-Taiba, with approval from Pakistani political and military leaders. The operation, executed solely by Pakistani terrorists, was led by Sulaiman, a suspected former Pakistani special forces commando.

title: Jaishankar meets Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar's visit to China marked a significant step in improving relations after years of border tensions. He met with President Xi Jinping and Wang Yi, discussing bilateral ties, border issues, and trade concerns. Both sides emphasized mutual respect and the importance of stable relations, with discussions also covering terrorism, trans-border rivers, and people-to-people exchanges.

title: Tesla enters India: 1st showroom to be launched in Mumbai; pricing details out
content: Tesla is officially entering the Indian market, launching its first showroom in Mumbai's Maker Maxity Mall. The EV giant has revealed the on-road price of the Model Y at Rs 61 lakh, with the rear-wheel drive variant priced at Rs 59.89 lakh.

title: Mumbai: Driver rams into pregnant woman; 18-year-old booked for rash driving
content: An 18-year-old student, Vyom Poddar, has been booked by Malabar Hill police after his car collided with a Mercedes in the Coastal Road tunnel on Sunday night. The Mercedes was occupied by a 33-year-old pregnant businesswoman, Sonam Bhabhani, and her husband. Bhabhani, a Bandra resident, sustained injuries to her leg, face, head, and back and was briefly hospitalized.

title: Explained: US supreme court allows Trump to dismantle education department - why it is a big deal
content: In a seismic decision that could redefine the limits of presidential power, the US Supreme Court has allowed President Donald Trump to effectively dismantle the Department of Educationâ€”firing more than 1,300 employees and gutting key civil rights protectionsâ€”without a single vote from Congress. The move, effectively halving the departmentâ€™s workforce, marks a dramatic escalation in the administrationâ€™s effort to shrink the federal role in American education.

title: â€˜I was married to a man who â€¦â€™, says Elon Musk's ex-wife in a 'big reveal'
content: Justine Wilson, Elon Musk's ex-wife, attributes his extraordinary success to his ability to say 'no' to distractions. Speaking at a TEDx Talk, she highlighted that while Elon worked incredibly hard, his strength lay in protecting his time and energy. By setting firm boundaries, he channeled his resources towards his goals.

title: Price prediction: Where are gold, silver rates headed in near-term?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are climbing amidst trade war tensions fueled by President Trump's tariffs on various economies and threats against Russia. Silver prices have surged to record highs due to strong ETF inflows and tight market conditions.

title: '4 RDX IEDs placed': BSE gets hoax bomb threat; email sent from ID named 'Comrade Pinarayi Vijayan'
content: The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) in Mumbai faced a bomb threat on Tuesday, triggering a swift security response. An email, purportedly from "Comrade Pinarayi Vijayan," warned of RDX IEDs set to detonate at 3 pm. Police and bomb squads conducted a thorough search, finding no explosives.

title: 'We will revoke your US visa and deport you if you do not ...': US Embassy in India
content: The US Embassy in India has issued a stern warning to visa holders, emphasizing that scrutiny continues even after visa issuance. Authorities continuously monitor compliance with US laws and immigration rules, with potential consequences including visa revocation and deportation for violations.

title: Student who immolated self over sexual harassment dies; college principal held - what we know
content: A 20-year-old BEd student in Balasore tragically died from burn injuries after attempting self-immolation, protesting alleged sexual harassment by a senior faculty member. The student accused the faculty of harassment and academic manipulation after the college failed to act on her complaints.

title: Popular pain drug can increase risk of dementia by 40%, reveals study
content: A recent study by Case Western University reveals a concerning link between gabapentin, a common drug for nerve pain and epilepsy, and an increased risk of dementia and mild cognitive impairment. Researchers found that individuals prescribed gabapentin for lower back pain were significantly more likely to develop these cognitive issues within ten years, especially with frequent prescriptions. Read more below!

title: Who was Fauja Singh? The 114-year-old, nicknamed 'Turbaned Tornado', killed in hit-and-run
content: Fauja Singh, the "Turbaned Tornado" and world's oldest marathon runner, tragically passed away at 114 after being struck by a car in his native Punjab. He began his running journey at 89, achieving numerous age-group records, including becoming the first centenarian to complete a marathon.

title: AI war: Zuckerberg ups the ante; offers Rs 1,600cr to Apple AI exec; here's who he is
content: Mark Zuckerberg is building Meta's Superintelligence Lab, offering record-breaking salaries up to Rs 1,600 crore to attract top AI talent from Apple, OpenAI, and Google DeepMind. This initiative aims to unify Meta's AI projects and accelerate the development of superintelligence, surpassing AGI. Meta's aggressive recruitment signals an intensified AI talent war in Silicon Valley.

title: Trump's education department dismantling plans get SC nod: 1,400 to lose jobs
content: The US Supreme Court has cleared the path for President Trump's plan to dismantle the federal education department, allowing the layoff of nearly 1,400 employees. This decision overturns a lower court ruling that had temporarily blocked the move.

title: Kapil Sharma asks Ajay Devgn about his late arrival on the show; he replies
content: The Great Indian Kapil Show is set to welcome the cast of Son of Sardaar 2, including Ajay Devgn, Ravi Kishan, and Mrunal Thakur. Ajay Devgn makes his first appearance on the show, while Ravi Kishan's jokes about Kapil's weight loss leave everyone in splits. The episode promises non-stop laughter with comedy gags and witty banter.

title: Glass House Farms raid: Over 360 arrested in marijuana crackdown; here's what happened
content: A major immigration raid at Southern California marijuana farms led to over 360 arrests and one death, escalating tensions between federal authorities and local officials. The operation, targeting alleged child labor and human trafficking, sparked protests and legal challenges. Los Angeles is providing support to affected communities amid concerns over the raids' justification and transparency.

title: NHL trade buzz: McDavid weighs Oilers loyalty; eyes free agency freedom
content: Elliotte Friedman suggests Connor McDavid is likely to sign a contract extension with the Edmonton Oilers, securing his future with the team beyond the 2025-26 season. Despite recent playoff heartbreaks and speculation about McDavid exploring free agency, the Oilers' captain seems committed to chasing a Stanley Cup in Edmonton. Negotiations for a lucrative contract extension are expected.

title: What happened to Eugenia Cooney after being AWOL in a livestream?
content: After a worrying live stream in May 2025, Eugenia Cooney has sparked a speculation of a death hoax, after she went radio silent, aided by a Meta AI summary and an alleged claim by a neighbour. However, there have been no any official confirmations, and fans are cautioned not to spread speculation and to wait until there is an actual update.

title: Kirk Cousinsâ€™ wife breaks down as Falcons bench him in Netflixâ€™s Quarterback
content: In Netflix's Quarterback Season 2, Julie Cousins shares the emotional impact of Kirk Cousins being benched for Michael Penix Jr. Despite the difficult news, Kirk displayed remarkable grace by calling Penix to congratulate him. This act of empathy resonated with fans, highlighting the Cousins' resilience and Kirk's exceptional character amidst a challenging transition within the Atlanta Falcons.

title: Sexual harassment case: Odisha student who immolated self succumbs to injuries; govt vows action
content: A 20-year-old student from FM Autonomous College, Balasore, tragically died after self-immolating due to alleged sexual harassment by a faculty member. Odisha CM Mohan Charan Majhi expressed deep sorrow and assured strict punishment for those guilty. The student's action followed protests against the college's inaction regarding her complaints.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens in green; BSE Sensex up over 150 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Tuesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,100, BSE Sensex was up over 150 points.

title: Watch: Subway lines submerged as heavy rain batters New York City
content: Heavy rainfall triggered flash floods across the northeastern United States, bringing New York City and New Jersey to a standstill. Subway lines were disrupted, major roads submerged, and a state of emergency declared in New Jersey. Residents were urged to stay indoors and take caution as emergency crews responded to incidents and worked to restore normal operations.

title: What are the main causes of kidney stones? Early signs indicative signs
content: Kidney stones are a hard mass formed in the kidneys, typically consisting of insoluble calcium compounds. The size of kidney stones ranges from grain-like, to a golf ball! While in some cases, kidney stones can cause pain, in most cases, it can remain asymptomatic, sometimes over years.

title: CoryxKenshin scandal: Ex accuses YouTuber of abuse, manipulation on TikTok
content: Popular YouTuber CoryxKenshin faces serious allegations from TikTok user @pandaninjaxxofficial, who detailed a harmful relationship involving emotional abuse and manipulation. The accusations include disturbing audio clips and screenshots of messages, sparking outrage online. @pandaninjaxxofficial described feeling emotionally discarded and used, while CoryxKenshin has yet to release an official statement, leaving fans in disbelief and demanding answers.

title: 'Successful in settling wars': Trump again claims that he stopped India, Pak conflict
content: Donald Trump has repeatedly claimed he averted a nuclear war between India and Pakistan, suggesting trade talks were leverage. However, this claim contrasts with the reality where tensions escalated after a terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir. India retaliated with military actions, prompting Pakistan to request a ceasefire, highlighting India's firm response to terrorism.

title: â€˜I told him...â€™ â€“ Jofra Archer reveals what he told Rishabh Pant in send-off | Watch
content: Jofra Archer's triumphant return to Test cricket after 4.5 years propelled England to a 22-run victory against India at Lord's, securing a 2-1 series lead. Six years after his World Cup heroics at the same venue, Archer's five-wicket haul, including key dismissals of Rishabh Pant and Washington Sundar, dismantled India's batting lineup.

title: WWE RAW results: Roman Reigns returns, CM Punk secures world title shot
content: Naomi's championship celebration was cut short by title contenders, setting up a SummerSlam triple threat. Bron Breakker dominated a gauntlet match until CM Punk's victory, earning a title shot. Roman Reigns made a shocking return, thwarting Breakker and Reed's attack on Punk and Uso, closing the show with a powerful statement.

title: 'Shouldnâ€™t be in the side?' â€” Jadeja silences Brookâ€™s sledge | Watch
content: Ravindra Jadeja's resilient innings of 61 not out nearly secured an improbable victory for India on Day 5 of the Lord's Test, frustrating England's bowlers with his composure. A lighthearted moment involving Harry Brook and Ben Duckett went viral amidst the tension.

title: Kolkata B-school rape: Survivor skips court date citing trauma; accused undergoes medical test
content: In Kolkata, the testimony of a woman accusing an MBA student of rape was delayed due to her trauma. The accused's lawyer presented a petition citing the complainant's father's denial of the allegations in media statements, requesting their inclusion in the case record. The accused underwent a medico-legal test, while the survivor is yet to consent to one.

title: Air India tragedy fallout: DGCA directs airlines to inspect fuel switches in Boeings
content: Following a recent AI 171 crash, India has directed airlines operating Boeing 737s and 787 Dreamliners to inspect fuel control switch locking mechanisms by July 21. This directive aligns with similar actions by regulators in South Korea and the UAE, prompted by a 2018 FAA bulletin. Air India has already inspected half its Dreamliner fleet, finding no issues.

title: â€˜Lack of intent cost themâ€™ â€” Former SA batter reacts to Indiaâ€™s loss at Lordâ€™s
content: Herschelle Gibbs criticized India's lack of intent after their 22-run defeat to England at Lord's. India collapsed to 112-8 chasing 193, before Ravindra Jadeja's resilient unbeaten 61 brought them close. However, with little support, India were bowled out for 170 as England's disciplined bowling attack secured the victory, going 2-1 up in the series.

title: Joy Taylor shocked fans â€” Fox Sports fires her mid-show
content: Joy Taylor's departure from Fox Sports, along with the cancellation of 'Speak' featuring Paul Pierce and Keyshawn Johnson, has surprised viewers. The network's decision to end the show, known for its sports debates, has sparked outrage among fans. Industry insiders speculate a shift towards live coverage and digital content may be the reason behind the programming changes.

title: 'They just bombedâ€¦': Melania swayed Trump on Russia; US to send billions to Ukraine
content: US President Trump revealed that First Lady Melania played a crucial role in influencing his tougher stance against Putin regarding the Russia-Ukraine war. Melania questioned Trump's optimistic views after his calls with Putin, citing ongoing attacks.

title: R Madhavan opens up on his son Vedaant's disciplined lifestyle
content: R Madhavan, celebrated for his roles in films like '3 Idiots,' is also a proud father. His son, Vedaant, a dedicated swimmer, adheres to a rigorous schedule, waking up at 4 a.m. Madhavan emphasizes the importance of open communication with his son, valuing his opinions since childhood.

title: Watch: WI post second-lowest Test score - Starc takes 5 in 15 balls, Boland picks hat-trick
content: In a stunning display of dominance, Australia crushed West Indies in the third test at Kingston. Mitchell Starc celebrated his 100th test with a remarkable six-wicket haul, surpassing 400 test wickets. Scott Boland's hat trick further dismantled the West Indies, who were bowled out for a paltry 27 runs.

title: Tragic! 114-year-old marathon runner Fauja Singh dies in road accident; Punjab Governor reacts
content: The world mourns Fauja Singh, the "Turbaned Tornado", who passed away at 114 in a road accident. He began his marathon journey at 89, becoming the oldest to complete a full marathon at 100. Punjab's Governor remembers him as a symbol of resilience, inspiring millions with his determination and spirit, leaving behind a legacy that transcends records.

title: Stopped by cops, CM Omar Abdullah climbs fence for homage at 1931 graves
content: J&K CM Omar Abdullah faced police obstruction while attempting to pay tribute at Srinagarâ€™s Naqshband Sahib shrine, leading to a physical confrontation and his scaling of a wall to access the site. Authorities had sealed the shrine and placed politicians under house arrest, intensifying the standoff between the elected government and the Centre-appointed administration.

title: After 300+ orbits, 1.3cr-km travel, Shux & crew undock from ISS; splashdown today
content: Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, along with the Axiom-4 mission crew, successfully undocked from the International Space Station after completing over 310 orbits and a 1.3-crore-km journey. The Dragon (Grace) capsule, carrying the crew and over 580 tonnes of cargo, including 60+ experiments, began its 22.5-hour return to Earth.

title: Centre fixes prices of 71 key drug formulations, including cancer medicines
content: The central government has regulated prices for 71 essential medicines. This includes drugs for breast cancer, allergies, and diabetes. Reliance Life Sciences' Trastuzumab is now capped at Rs 11,966 per vial. Torrent Pharmaceuticals' peptic ulcer drug is fixed at Rs 162.5 per tablet. The NPPA also set prices for anti-diabetes medications. The NPPA ensures fair pricing for pharmaceuticals across India.

title: Could it be heart failure? 7 silent signs you shouldnâ€™t ignore
content: Heart failure, a condition where the heart doesn't pump blood efficiently, manifests through symptoms like shortness of breath, fatigue, and swelling. Recognizing these signs early is crucial for timely intervention and improved outcomes. Consulting a doctor for diagnosis and treatment, along with lifestyle adjustments, can significantly enhance the quality of life and potentially extend lifespan.

title: Starc, Boland wreak havoc as West Indies bowled out for just 27 runs
content: Mitchell Starc's devastating spell of 6-9 and Scott Boland's hat-trick propelled Australia to a dominant 176-run victory over the West Indies in the third test at Kingston, completing a 3-0 series sweep. The West Indies were bowled out for a paltry 27, the second-lowest total in test history, as Starc also reached his 400th test wicket.

title: Celebrity golf tournament:The Kelce brothers spark viral moment
content: Football icon Tom Brady and hockey legend Wayne Gretzky met at the FIFA Club World Cup Final. Chelsea defeated Paris-Saint Germain by 3-0. Brady playfully tagged Tie Domi on social media. Both Brady and Gretzky were seen in US President Donald Trump's VIP suite. Earlier, Brady and Domi attended David Beckham's 50th birthday.

title: Alarming: 65 in-flight engine shutdowns reported since 2020 - RTI data
content: A recent RTI query reveals a concerning trend of engine malfunctions plaguing Indian airlines. Sixty-five in-flight engine shutdowns occurred between 2020 and 2025, accompanied by eleven 'Mayday' calls in just seventeen months. Experts attribute these incidents to technical issues like fuel contamination and turbine malfunction.

title: Saina Nehwal pens heartfelt note confirming the end of marriage with Parupalli Kashyap
content: Badminton stars Saina Nehwal and Parupalli Kashyap have announced their separation. The couple married in 2018. They met at Pullela Gopichand Academy. Saina shared a message on Instagram. She mentioned choosing peace and growth. Both athletes have achieved significant milestones in their careers. They request privacy during this time. Fans are wishing them well for the future.

title: Bengaluru stampede: Karnataka high court orders full disclosure of status report
content: The Karnataka High Court has mandated the disclosure of a status report concerning the M Chinnaswamy Stadium stampede, rejecting the state government's request for a sealed cover. The court emphasized that the case does not involve national security or public interest concerns that would justify confidentiality.

title: Taylor Swift ignores Kamala Harrisâ€™ call for support: Fans split over political silence
content: Taylor Swift reportedly refused a request to perform for Kamala Harris's 2024 campaign. Instead, she chose to sing at Travis Kelce's Tight End University event. This decision has sparked debate about her political priorities. Some defend her right to choose, while others question her commitment to progressive causes. The contrast highlights Swift's independence in choosing where to lend her voice.

title: Dumper's Derby: Raleigh first C to take HR crown
content: Mariners star and MLB home run leader Cal Raleigh became the first catcher to win the Home Run Derby on Monday night.

title: Report: Sternberg to sell Rays for $1.7 billion
content: Stu Sternberg has agreed in principle to a $1.7 billion deal to sell the Rays to a group led by a Florida-based developer Patrick Zalupski.

title: Miz on All-Star critics: 'They're not upset with me'
content: Brewers rookie Jacob Misiorowski, whose inclusion on the National League All-Star roster has created a stir, said Monday that he wasn't offended by the criticism over his selection.

title: Sources: Jets WR Wilson lands $130M extension
content: The Jets and wide receiver Garrett Wilson reached agreement on a four-year, $130 million contract extension that includes $90 million guaranteed, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Monday.

title: Sirianni rips narrative that Eagles carried Hurts
content: Eagles coach Nick Sirianni offered a pointed response to the notion that quarterback Jalen Hurts was along for the ride during Philadelphia's Super Bowl run last season, calling it "bulls---."

title: 76ers' George has arthroscopic knee surgery
content: Philadelphia 76ers star Paul George underwent an arthroscopic procedure on his left knee Monday to treat an injury suffered during a recent workout.

title: Sources: 49ers' Jennings wants new deal or trade
content: 49ers wide receiver Jauan Jennings, who is scheduled to make $7.5 million in the final year of his deal, wants a new contract or a trade, sources told ESPN.

title: Sankey: SEC, Big Ten have 'different view' of CFP
content: SEC commissioner Greg Sankey says his league and the Big Ten have a "different view" on the College Football Playoff format, which could lead to the possibility that it remains a 12-team format in 2026.

title: ðŸ‘€ Snoop Dogg helps Swansea troll Wrexham
content: Not to be outdone by Wrexham's Hollywood glamour, Swansea City enlisted Snoop Dogg to unveil their new jersey and take a shot at their Welsh rivals.

content: Can Scottie Scheffler add to his major total? Is Jon Rahm headed toward big things at Royal Portrush? We break down the top 25 players who can win the 2025 Open Championship.

content: Odds for next four golf majors: 2025 Open Championship, 2026 Masters, PGA Championship and U.S. Open.

title: Takeaways: Rating the tournament, best moment, surprise teams, more
content: The 2025 FIFA Club World Cup is over, with Chelsea crowned champions. Time to let our reporters who covered the competition chime in with their final thoughts on the good, bad and ugly.

content: Where do Paige Bueckers, Caitlin Clark and A'ja Wilson land? Our midseason rankings have a new No. 1 and seven new players.

content: A year after Jones' death, former Ravens teammates Torrey Smith, Bryan Hall and Ray Rice are among those helping Emily London-Jones carry on Jones' mission.

title: Unstoppable Lionel Messi has Miami back on top
content: Lionel Messi registered his fifth straight multigoal game, propelling Miami to the top of ESPN's MLS Power Rankings.

title: Reports: Spanish agencies want Yamal party probe
content: Spain's Ministry for Social Rights has requested an investigation into possible breaches of disability laws at Barcelona star Lamine Yamal's 18th birthday party, according to EFE.

title: Sources: Newcastle on verge of â‚¬80m Ekitike deal
content: Newcastle are on the verge of finalising an â‚¬80 million ($93.3m) deal for Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike, sources have told ESPN.

title: USMNT to play Ecuador, Australia in Oct. friendlies
content: The United States will play Venezuela and Australia in a pair of friendlies in October as part of its preparation for the 2026 World Cup, U.S. Soccer announced on Monday.

title: Chelsea's Colwill: CWC will be bigger than UCL
content: Chelsea's Levi Colwill has said his side is ready to win the Premier League and Champions League after they won the Club World Cup.

title: Arsenal target Mosquera confirms Valencia exit
content: Arsenal target Cristhian Mosquera has appeared to confirm his Valencia departure, claiming he is leaving "home" to begin a "new era."

title: Euro 2025 group games draw record crowds
content: The group stage of the Women's European Championship which finished on Sunday had record-breaking attendances with close to half a million fans attending games.

title: Modric joins Milan after 13 seasons at Madrid
content: At age 39, Luka Modric is going to try and help restore seven-time European champion AC Milan to glory after one of the most disappointing Rossoneri seasons in recent memory.

title: Club World Cup triumph shows Chelsea can win the Premier League
content: Chelsea have been crowned world champions -- but only when they end their Premier League title drought will the Blues be able to say they are back where they expect to be.

content: Eric Karabell's provides an introduction to the ins and outs of salary cap drafts for fantasy football.

content: After an early exit at her favorite Slam last month, Swiatek rebounded on her worst surface to take the Wimbledon title.

content: People who have received forms from the Kudawala allege that they did not get any receipt and the form did not bear any bar code on it

content: The move comes after his unexpected performance as an Independent candidate in the Nilambur byelection where he secured around 20,000 votes

content: According to SpiceJet, despite repeated requests by the cabin crew, fellow passengers, and the captain, the two passengers refused to return to their seats

title: IMD sounds flash flood alert for 19 Jharkhand districts amid widespread rainfall
content: Ranchi Meteorological Centre Deputy Director Abhishek Anand said the State is likely to experience widespread rainfall till July 17 under the influence of a depression and monsoon trough

content: Senior advocate and farmer activist Vajnath Zhalki has urged the government of Karnataka and insurance companies to clear claims for the crop loss suffered in 2024

content: In a social media post, Mr. Jaishankar said he apprised President Xi about the recent development in India-China bilateral ties.

content: Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Odisha, Andhra Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Gujarat, Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand and Uttarakhand have their own anti-conversion law

content: Mr. Gandhi while speaking to The Hindu said that Mukhiya (village head) of the Turkauliya village made personal attack saying he was not the descendant of Mahatma Gandhi

content: No child between the ages of six and 14 should be left out of the education system, added the U.P. CMÂ

content: If schools are located far from homes, how will small children, especially girls, walk several kilometers to reach school, she asked

content: Opposition has welcomed this move and raised concerns around the modus operandi of drug peddlers involving minors

content: Mr. Raj allegedly said that if people from other States are beaten, they should be beaten, but no videos should be made

content: The new â€˜Campus Mothersâ€™ student welfare initiative, seeking to enlist female volunteers to offer informal emotional support to students, was criticised by mental health professionals for being â€œgenderedâ€

content: The Dragon, which is carrying the Ax-4 crew, will also announce its arrival with a brief sonic boom prior to splashing down

title: Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology researchers gear up to study seeds that were sent to space
content: Seeds of Jyothi and Uma rice varieties, Kanakamani (horse gram), Vellayani Vijay (tomato), Thilakathara (sesame) and Soorya (brinjal/eggplant) were sent to the ISS under the â€˜Crop Seeds on ISSâ€™, a project spearheaded by the IISTâ€™s Space Biology Lab.

title: Kaziranga records high diversity of grassland bird species
content: A team of forest officials, bird experts, scientists, and conservationists recorded 43 grassland species across Kazirangaâ€™s three wildlife divisions

content: Officials say that the NESTS had disbursed â‚¹62.40 lakh of this discretionary fund to 823 meritorious students who have secured the highest marks in their respective streams

content: It informs court that the Mumbra accident probe is under review, while responding to a petition on railway commuter safety

title: Minister seeks Central support for rural livelihood projects in A.P.
content: In a meeting with Union Minister of State for Rural Development Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar on Monday, Mr. Srinivas urged to support micro-enterprises and food processing units in Amaravati and CRDA villages.

title: A.P. CM launches portal to make drone services accessible to commoners
content: The platform connects users directly with certified drone service providers, thereby enabling people and government departments to request services as needed

title: Odisha girl who self-immolated on college campus dies
content: Odisha Chief Minister Mohan Charan Majhi expressed grief and assured the family of the deceased that all those guilty in this case will face the strictest punishment as per the law.

content: Citing a NITI Aayog report, the West Bengal Chief Minister says the State fared better in areas such as employment, sex ratio and infant mortality rate, and adds that these achievements reflect the State governmentâ€™s â€˜continued commitment to inclusive and sustainable developmentâ€™

content: Tesla is a brand of big expectations in the domain of electric mobility for the Indian market. After a long journey, the electric carmaker is making its formal entry to the Indian market on July 15, 2025.

title: Case Against Thane Job Agent For Allegedly Cheating Recruiter Of Rs 22 Lakh
content: Police here have registered a case against a job agent for allegedly cheating a recruiter of nearly Rs 22 lakh under the pretext of facilitating employment in Singapore for the latter's clients, an official said on Tuesday.

title: Odisha Horror: Inaction Over Sex Harassment, Self-Immolation - A Timeline
content: An Odisha college student who set herself ablaze following alleged sexual harassment by a professor succumbed to injuries at AIIMS Bhubaneswar late on Monday.

title: Odisha Student Who Set Herself On Fire Over Inaction Against Harassment Dies
content: A 22-year-old student in an Odisha college, who set herself on fire over inaction on a sexual harassment complaint against a professor, died last night after battling for life for three days.

title: Donald Trump Denies Bond Hearings, Expands Immigrant Detention
content: The Trump administration is launching a new effort to keep immigrants who entered the US illegally detained by denying them bond hearings, an internal memo showed, a change that could further swell the numbers of those held.

title: Tesla's Long-Awaited India Debut Bets On Luxury Vehicle Buyers
content: Tesla Inc. is opening its first India showroom as Elon Musk's electric-vehicle maker looks to ply new markets and offset slowing sales where it's already well established.

title: Woman Killed, 2 Injured After Portion Of Hospital Building Collapses In Kerala
content: A woman died and at least two others, including a child, were injured after a part of the Government Medical College Hospital in Kottayam collapsed on Thursday, police said here.

title: Delhi Eyes Rs 6,000 Crore Elevated Corridor Over Ring Road To Ease Traffic
content: In a bid to decongest one of Delhi's most saturated traffic corridors, the city government is planning to construct an elevated corridor over the 55-kilometre-long Inner Ring Road.

title: US Supreme Court Allows Trump To Resume Dismantling Education Department
content: A sharply divided US Supreme Court let President Donald Trump resume dismantling the Department of Education, lifting a lower court order that required the reinstatement of as many as 1,400 workers.

title: US Imposes 17% Duty On Mexican Fresh Tomatoes
content: The United States is imposing antidumping duties on most imports of fresh tomatoes from Mexico, the US Commerce Department said Monday as Washington alleged its neighbor engaged in  unfair trade.

content: The Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), Mumbai, has seized cocaine worth Rs 62.6 crore from an Indian woman at Mumbai International Airport, an official said on Monday.

content: Two unruly passengers were offloaded from a SpiceJet flight at the Delhi airport on Monday after they attempted to forcefully enter the cockpit when the aircraft was taxiing.

title: Christian McCaffrey and Olivia Culpo announce birth of first child with joint post
content: Christian McCaffrey  and Olivia Culpo welcomed their first child. The  San Francisco 49ers  star running back and former Miss Universe announced the news in a joint Instagram post on Sunday. The black-and-white photo collage included images of the couple in the delivery room as well each of them cradling their baby. McCaffrey and Culpo  announced in March  that they were expecting. A post shared by Olivia Frances Culpo (@oliviaculpo) "Colette Annalise McCaffrey" the couple wrote together on Instagram. Culpo posted a photo of McCaffrey with their baby on her Instagram story, captioning it: "Colette is so lucky to have the best daddy in the world. A love like no other." She also added a photo of McCaffrey consoling Culpo while in the delivery room, writing: "The scariest and most rewarding of all experiences. As soon as he came into the room I felt most at peace." McCaffrey and Culpo  married in June 2024 .

title: Why PSG shouldn't dwell too much on Club World Cup rout by Chelsea
content: PSG lost 3-0 to Chelsea in the club world cup final . they went on a tear that saw them win 17 of their next 19 games . coach Luis Enrique turned them into a near-flawless football machine .

title: Real Madrid sign left-back Carreras from Benfica
content: lvaro Carreras is real madrid's latest defensive recruit . the 22-year-old spent three years at the academy before moving to manchester united in 2020 . defender is the club's preferred candidate to strengthen at left-back .

title: Fighters grades: One A, one F, and a lot in between after a weekend full of boxing
content: undisputed junior welterweight champion Katie Taylor wins by majority decision to remain unbeaten in their fight trilogy . it was a brilliant performance by Taylor, who decided to slow down the pace to keep Serrano guessing and out of range .

title: Euro 2025 Daily: England thrash Wales and avoid Germany, Spain in bracket

title: Favorite (and surprising) Day 1 MLB draft picks -- and Day 2's top names
content: the nationals select shortstop Eli Willits with the first overall pick of the 2025 MLB draft . it's time to look at which picks in the first round stood out most . some of the picks we aren't quite sure about on Day 1 will become clearer .

title: 2025 MLB draft tracker: Day 2 pick-by-pick results and Day 1 analysis
content: all 20 rounds of the 2025 MLB draft are in the books . the Washington Nationals select shortstop Eli Willits with the no. 1 overall pick . college pitcher Tyler Bremner and the Seattle Mariners nabbed another in Kade Anderson .

title: Takeaways from the Home Run Derby in Atlanta
content: Cal Raleigh becomes the first catcher to win the 2025 home run Derby . the Seattle Mariners slugger outlasted junior Caminero . it was a power-packed night in Atlanta as oneil Cruz hit a ball a whopping 513 feet .

title: Who are the NFL's best quarterbacks? Execs, coaches and scouts help rank 2025's top 10
content: ESPN surveyed league executives, coaches and scouts to help us rank the top 10 players at 11 different positions, from quarterback to cornerback and all positions in between . in total, more than 70 voters submitted a ballot on at least one position, and in many cases all positions .

title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: Where LSU fits after landing Lamar Brown
content: no. 1 overall prospect Lamar Brown commits to play for the LSU Tigers . 15 of the teams in the current top 25 secured at least one ESPN 300 commitment . Alabama is on the rise by adding multiple four-star (or better) prospects .

title: New rules for EBUGs? 84 games? What to know about the NHL's new CBA
content: the current CBA runs through the end of the 2025-26 season . the new CBA is set to begin on sept. 16, 2026 and runs through Sept. 15, 2030 . it would make the fastest both sides have reached an extension in Gary Bettman's tenure .

title: Can Brian Kelly and LSU win it all?
content: coach Brian Kelly has worked at lSU for more than 35 years . he will join Nick Saban, Les Miles and Ed Orgeron as a national champion . the team has a unique focus taking hold in the weight room .
